Description: Version control systems allow you to track changes to your codebase/files over time. They enable you to go back to previous code versions and collaborate seamlessly with others on the same project.
An introductory video explaining version control systems and their importance.

Topic: Git & GitHub Crash Course For Beginners (YouTube)
Description: A crash course on Git and GitHub for beginners, covering the basics of version control.
A quick tutorial that teaches the basics of Git in just 20 minutes.
Official documentation for the Git version control system, providing in-depth information and guidance.
A resource by Atlassian that offers comprehensive learning materials and tutorials for Git.
